EmailTemplate.name: webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-02-19 EMEA.eblast testing E.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Webinar and Demo: Risk Management Engine
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Solution: Accelerate Business Innovation with Model-Based Test Automation Webinar
Date: Wednesday, November 6, 2013
Time: 1:00 p.m. - 2:00 p.m. CET
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> In this short, 45-minute webinar, see a demo of Tosca Testsuite and learn more about these topics:
- Automated testing and how it can speed time to value for your company - Leveraging the knowledge of business testers to automate test cases - Model-based testing and the use of modules in Tosca Testsuite.
At the end of the webinar, you will have a chance to ask questions of the presenters. <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
